content: spring is just around the corner but it s still cool enough that some days require a little something to cover your head this crochet slouch hat is perfect for that transition between seasons maintaining a nice balance of warmth while still being light weight and not bulky **this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience ** **difficulty ** intermediate **materials needed ** 4 5mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge 150 220 300 325 yards of #3 lightweight bernat baby sport in grasshopper cloudburst baby taupe ecru or bernat baby softee in antique white scissors yarn needle stitch markers **stitches used ** chain/chs = chain/chains single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fphdc = front post half_double_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet **additional terms ** small puff small puff yo pull up a loop 3 times in same st yo pull through 6 loops yo pull through final 2 loops puff yo pull up a loop 4 times in same st yo pull through 8 loops yo pull through final 2 loops skip = skip st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces prev = previous **measurements ** toddler 7 tall by 8 1/2 wide at widest point child 9 tall by 10 across at widest point adult 11 tall by 11 wide across widest point adult extra slouchy 11 tall by 12 wide across widest point **gauge ** hat should measure 4 across after round 7 **additional notes ** -chain 1 at beginning of round does not count as a stitch -fpdc and fptr stitches will be worked around the fpdc or fptr sts directly below them you may have 2-3 rounds between them but always work your fpdc or fptr stitches around the one below this is what creates the vertical ridges that run up the sides of the hat -there are 2 different adult size slouch hats one is great if you have lots of hair or a larger than average head the other should fit the average women s head *see pattern for more notes* this pattern in the adult size only is also included in happily hooked magazine s issue #45 last minute gifts december 2017 titled as the dream catcher slouch
